name: Watch Your Step (Trijam 171)
description:
Use WASD to move, and click to shoot.  You can't be hurt while you aren't shooting (other than falling off the platform).  The blue tile is the tile that is about to move to a new location, and the red tile is one that is about to disappear.  Your health is on the bottom.  

This was made for Trijam 171, and it's my first game.  It relies heavily on MoreMountain's TopDown asset for Unity.  I meant to replace more of the default assets, but I ran out of time.  In fact, I ended up running over 3 hours, and I still had lots of ideas that I didn't get around to.  Frequently, I ran into problems and got stuck without making much progress for a long period.  But, I'm glad that I actually finished it, anyway!  It was a fun experience!
